content.html: Just seen a guy refer to a cis woman who said she’d be happy to share toilets with Eddie Izzard as a ‘silly bitch’. Because how can you ‘protect women’ if the silly bitches won’t think what you tell them to think?
content.value:
Just seen a guy refer to a cis woman who said she’d be happy to share toilets with Eddie Izzard as a ‘silly bitch’.

Because how can you ‘protect women’ if the silly bitches won’t think what you tell them to think?
